rules.description: Rule Code: TB-001Exxx Time Billing on Hold - North America Sends an email to Jennifer R, Chitra, and the Project Manager whenever a time billing is put on hold for the North America region
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Hold from Invoicing"), NOT(Project__r.pse__Region__r.Id = 'a2F50000000oYg9'), NOT(Project__r.pse__Region__r.Id = 'a2F50000000oYgE') )

rules.description: Rule Code: TB-002Exxx Time Billing on Hold - EMEA Sends an email to Neil V, Chitra, and the Project Manager whenever time billing is put on hold for the EMEA region
Rule Code: TB-003Exxx Time Billing on Hold - APAC Sends an email to Paul, Chitra, and the Project Manager whenever a time billing is put on hold for the APAC region
